Class Abutton

  • java.lang.Object
    • Abutton

  • public class Abutton
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Matthew A class dedicated to the functions and design of a button.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BUTTON_HEIGHT
      To define a "standard" size button

      To hold the label of the button

      To make it appear a button has been pressed.

      The location of the button and sizes of the button.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Abutton()
      Instantiates a button from scratch.
      Abutton(java.lang.String someLabel, java.awt.Color someColor, int someX, int someY)
      Instantiates a button of a "standard" size, given the rest of its components.
      Abutton(java.lang.String someLabel, java.awt.Color someColor, int someX, int someY, int someWidth, int someHeight)
      Instantiates a button given all its components.
